channel.title: L4D2: The Globe Amphitheater
channel.description:
I recently had to do a report in English about Elizabethan amphitheaters and decided to try and make one for a L4D2 scavange map.
Here is my reference picture. It has 16 sides, but the one I am making in Hammer has 12 because that's a lot easier to deal with. ![](upload://2qvXWQ3HYQChzcrTWvdd1XUGP6X.jpeg)
Here are some pictures. ![](upload://mG0kaBn0ZvIKCvz1vTsYgqRDtIC.jpeg) ![](upload://2HIIIz8ixUgCVa98boFt5kipKhO.jpeg) ![](upload://zIdlyPzM0IZrXT4nK199YPzH22k.jpeg)
Here's a really shitty quality video of the map. [url='https://s276.photobucket.com/albums/kk22/garthbartin/?action=view&current=left4dead22010-02-0619-13-56-83.flv']Amphitheatre Video[/url]
It's still very much a work in progress. I'd like someone to do a bit of modeling and texturing for the columns and railings.

item.title: L4D2: The Globe Amphitheater
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
xalener:

Not bad. I remember when you just started working on this.

Hey, are do DONE done, or are you still tweaking? I could help you with some custom textures if you want any.

For now, Done done.

I think I’ll make a second version with custom textures and models if I can get a hold of them. If you want to make a texture, I need an overlay texture for the front of the amphitheater for the “The Globe” sign. I can resize it in-game so size doesn’t matter, so whatever works. It needs to be in some old-fashioned font with the “G” and “T” capitalized.

Read full topic

item.title: L4D2: The Globe Amphitheater
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
Performing CPR!!!

Here is version 1.0 of The Globe.
(reposting reference image for comparison)

1024×768 155 KB

1024×576 59.9 KB

1024×576 99 KB

1024×576 84.1 KB

1024×576 75.7 KB

1024×576 87.4 KB

1024×576 81.9 KB

1024×576 58.7 KB

The biggest change is all the buildings outside the map. There are also some minor things here and there, but not much. I actually had this finished a few months ago but several glitches that I just now got around to fixing kept me from releasing it. There are still some glitches such as the map thumbnail not working correctly, but they are all cosmetic and the game is 100% playable. I’d like to get a team of 4 going to see how far we can get in the map. Tell me if you’d like to try that. The survivor AI seem even more stupid than usual and they will run off to pick up better guns and leave yous stranded. Also, it’s incredibly hard to make a bronze medal with the dumb AI, I definitely recommend playing this with at least one other person.

And here is the link: The Globe L4D2 map.

I’ll be posting this on l4dmaps.com soon unless you guys have any major immediate suggestions. The map is in dire need of custom content such as models and textures. I’m going to try and learn modelling over thw summer and my brother is going to learn some texturing, but if anyone else wants to make some models and or textures for this map please pm me.

Read full topic

item.title: L4D2: The Globe Amphitheater
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
Update/bump.

1024×576 65.4 KB

1024×576 53.2 KB

1024×576 75.8 KB

1024×576 63.1 KB

Tree added, wooden beams on the outside of the building added, “The Globe” sign added, doors placed between the backstage and audience on the second and third floors, and a few minor details.

The “The Globe” sign on the front of the building is just a placeholder I am hoping someone could make a texture for a decal for me that says “The Globe” in really fancy old-fashoned black writing. It would need to be around 192x112 (the size of the current sign). Also, to give you more of a reference, the “T” in the sign is 40x48. And lastly, if someone makes this for me I’d like only the “T” and the “G” to be capitalized. Unless anyone has any good ideas I think once I get a sign and fix some glitches I’ll be ready to start work on the director and the navmesh.

Read full topic

item.title: L4D2: The Globe Amphitheater
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
Reviving long dead thread with big update!!! Hopefully I won’t have to triple post this time.:’(

1024×576 46.9 KB

1024×576 63.5 KB

1024×576 56.6 KB

1024×576 66.6 KB

1024×576 68 KB

1024×576 52.2 KB

Changes: 3d skybox, changed to night, more torches, outer wall, no more trees (more better ones will be added back), stage made bigger and library/study props added, entrance added, and various stage props added behind the stage.

What I still want to do: Fix some glitches with dynamic lighting (I will make a thread in help and support),put a flag of some sort on top of the tower, make the front outside more interesting (maybe put some banners/signs saying The Globe?), more props/better props, trees and other scenery just outside of the theater, shacks/houses around the theater for Zombies to spawn in?, and add more places for the Zombies to enter the theater from outside.

EDIT: oh, and set up the director and nav mesh. Also, I’ve decided to make this a survival map because that way you can play it alone or with only one or two other people. How do you play a custom map online with friends on L4D2?

Aze:

I like it, but aren’t the corridors a bit too narrow?

Yes, but it’s too late to change that, so the charger is just going to have to have a little bit of trouble getting around. I am more going for looks than gameplay in this map. If the gameplay comes out well, great, if it doesn’t then oh well.

Read full topic

item.title: L4D2: The Globe Amphitheater
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
1024×576 107 KB

1024×576 88 KB

1024×576 110 KB

Not a whole lot different, mainly just some more texturing, but it looks a lot better (I think).

I think all that’s left is fixing the outside, lots and lots of detail work, and then setting it up for scavange. Right now there are no entrances to the amphitheatre, I’m thinking of getting rid of the staircase opposite the stage and putting an entrance on the bottom floor there.

Triple post. :’(

Read full topic

item.title: L4D2: The Globe Amphitheater
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
Finally, an update.

1024×576 94.5 KB

1024×576 71.9 KB

1024×576 74.8 KB

1024×576 70.8 KB

1024×576 60.6 KB

I’m still working on the lighting, so it doesn’t look very good right now.

I’ve added the “heavens” (thing above the stage), some torches here and there, put some trees outside of the theater, added a bunch of supports, made the side behind the stage, and made the first floor a lot shorter.

Read full topic

item.title: L4D2: The Globe Amphitheater
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
Medevilae:

Make the sound actually echo/reverberate; it’d be both eerie and super awesome.

Unfortunately I wouldn’t know how to do that and it would require you to download a new version of every single sound used in L4D2 scavange just to play the map.

item.title: L4D2: The Globe Amphitheater
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
The blockiness will probably go away when I get to put more work into this. Remember, it’s WIP, only about 2 weekend’s worth of work. If anybody is interested, I need some modelers/textures to make columns between each story, to make railings for the staircase, and to perhaps make something to fancy up the railings between the columns. Post here and I will give you the dimensions of the models I need and descriptions. Also, don’t worry if the texturing looks bad, I’m waiting until I’m done with everything else to really work on that.

Read full topic
